text: Frosty the Snowman is a 1969 American animated Christmas television special produced by Rankin Bass Productions. == Voice cast == * Jackie Vernon as Frosty * Jimmy Durante as the Narrator * June Foray as Karen, Karen's friends, and Teacher * Billy De Wolfe as Professor Hinkle * Paul Frees as Traffic Cop, Ticket Man, and Santa Claus == Production credits == * Producers/Directors: Arthur Rankin Jr., Jules Bass * Writer: Romeo Muller * Based on "Frosty the Snowman" by Steve Nelson and Jack Rollins * Character Designer: Paul Coker Jr. * Continuity Designer: Don Duga Category:1969 in entertainment Category:Television programs
title: Frosty the Snowman (TV special)
